### Welcome
I am a **Full Professor** at the [Department of Telematic Engineering](https://www.it.uc3m.es/) of [**Universidad Carlos III de Madrid**](https://www.uc3m.es/). My research focuses on wireless networking, performance evaluation, and the intersection of AI and communications.
